app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Birthday Music Video Maker
app_description: Key Features: Photo Editing Video Editing Photo Collage Photo Slideshow Add music to videos Add music to slideshow This app helps you to create beautiful birthday portrait birthday slideshow with music and birthday video with advance editing features. This app also provide different type of photo and video overlay collection like video filters fx light and frames and effects like beautify brightness contrast saturation hue and blur. Features: Trending photo transition effects 150 grid layouts to choose from for photo collage 100 background images patterns and color for slideshow Export video with different layouts like square portrait and landscape Remove unwanted part from video with video trim Adjust video layout ration with video crop Add music over slideshow and video from birthday music and music gallery Add text caption and sticker over photo and video Sort photos with drag and drop effects for slideshow Easy to use and share photos videos and stories Now give life to your photos and create awesome photos videos and stories from photos with Birthday Music Video Maker!! Birthday Music Video Maker Premium Subscription With Birthday Music Video Maker Premium subscription you have access to all features and paid editing materials including fx light frames backgrounds stickers filter packages etc. Watermark and advertisements will be removed automatically. Birthday Music Video Maker Premium subscription is billed weekly monthly or annually at the rate corresponding to the selected plan. In addition a life time payment will be offered if needed which is not one of the subscription plan. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
